topics.title: Greeting Someone
topics.prompt: Practice greeting a friend and asking how they are.
topics.hint: 用英文跟朋友打招呼，並問對方感覺如何，說2~3句。

topics.title: Describing How You Feel
topics.prompt: Say three different feelings you have today and explain why.
topics.hint: 說出今天你的三種不同感覺，用簡短句子說明原因，講3~4句。

topics.title: Responding to Greetings
topics.prompt: Answer the question 'How are you?' with positive and negative responses.
topics.hint: 練習如何用正面和負面的方式回應「你怎麼樣？」這個問題，說4~5句。

topics.title: Talking About Being Tired or Hungry
topics.prompt: Describe a time when you felt tired or hungry and what you did.
topics.hint: 分享你曾經感到疲倦或飢餓的經驗，說明當時你做了什麼，講3~4句。

topics.title: Using Different Greetings
topics.prompt: List and say three different ways to greet someone in English.
topics.hint: 列出並說出三種不同英文問候語，可以是正式或非正式，說3句。

topics.title: How to Ask Someone's Well-being
topics.prompt: Practice asking 'How are you?' in different ways.
topics.hint: 用不同英文句型練習問「你怎麼樣？」，可以用簡單句，說3句。

topics.title: Expressing Mixed Feelings
topics.prompt: Talk about a time when you felt both good and not so good at the same time.
topics.hint: 描述一次你同時有好和不太好的感覺，說3~4句，說明原因。

topics.title: Imagining a Conversation
topics.prompt: Create a short dialogue where two friends greet each other and talk about their feelings.
topics.hint: 想像兩個朋友打招呼並談論感覺的對話，練習講5~6句。

topics.title: Describing Daily Mood
topics.prompt: Describe your mood today using simple sentences and explain why.
topics.hint: 用簡單句說明今天的心情，並說出原因，講3~4句。

topics.title: Comparing Feelings Yesterday and Today
topics.prompt: Compare how you felt yesterday and how you feel today.
topics.hint: 比較昨天和今天的感覺，可以用兩三句說明差別。
